snippet: Palestinian medical officials accused Israeli soldiers of killing the farmer, Mustafa Abu Jarad, 21, but a military spokeswoman denied any Israeli involvement.
abstract: Palestinian farmer dies hours after being shot in northern Gaza Strip; Palestinian medical officials accuse Israeli soldiers of being responsible, but military spokesman denies any Israeli involvement.
lead_paragraph: Palestinian medical officials accused Israeli soldiers of killing the farmer, Mustafa Abu Jarad, 21, but a military spokeswoman denied any Israeli involvement.
